channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Production Scheduling
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Production Scheduling

item.title: CVE-2024-21088|2024-04-16T21:26:28.130Z -- oracle%20corporation -- production%20scheduling
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Production Scheduling product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Import Utility). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.4-12.2.12. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Production Scheduling. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Oracle Production Scheduling accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).
